welcome.title: Professional career certifications are different!
welcome.body: If you already have an account, log in to Careerzen using your existing account.

verify_email.title: Sign up!
verify_email.body: Professional personal members, please make sure to verify your personal email, work emails make it harder to find your account if you leave..
verify_email.alert_body: All personal information is stored encrypted and remains private, and can only be seen by others with your permission.

accordion.terms_of_services_description: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.
accordion.privacy_policy_description: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.
accordion.reward_notification_description: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.

email_verify.title: verify email
email_verify.desc: We have send you an email to
email_verify.desc2: with a 6-digit code. You can use this code to verify your email address.

finished_profile.title: Career Avatar Creation Completed
finished_profile.desc: Add achievements, education, etc. to your blockchain-based permanent certification profile and complete your own career avatar!
finished_profile.subtitle: What should we start with?
finished_profile.admin_desc: Create unique NFTs for our organization

join_project.title: Join Project
join_project.body: Join this project to start working on it.
join_project.message_ex: Tell us a little bit about yourself

invite_member.title: Invite member
invite_member.body: At the same time as inviting team members, managers, and clients who worked on the project together, a request for evaluation of my performance is also sent.
invite_member.can_not_find: I can not find my nickname.
invite_member.name: Name

evaluate.evaluate_performance_description: Please evaluate users role and performance in this project
evaluate.hourly_wage_team: Enter hourly wage set for the team member.
evaluate.please_evaluate_users_role_and_performan: Please evaluate users role and performance in this project.
evaluate.does_the_work_details_match_the_facts: Does the work written by the user match the facts?
evaluate.more_than_20: More than 20% of the information stated is different from the facts
evaluate.more_than_15: More than 15% of the information stated is different from the facts
evaluate.more_than_10: More than 10% of the information stated is different from the facts
evaluate.more_than_5: More than 5% of the information stated is different from the facts

meet_requirements.label: Did their deliverables meet your requirements?
messages: More than 20% missing or defective (critical defects or omissions)
Less than 20% of omissions or defects (level that makes response difficult)
About 10% of omissions or defects (a level that can be handled)
Only the essential requirements were met.
It satisfied all requirements.

meet_schedule.label: Did the users meet the time schedules of the project?
messages: More than +4 days late from the agreed upon task duration
More than +2 days late from the agreed upon task duration
More than +1 day late from the agreed upon task duration
Completed and shared work within the due date
Worked ahead of milestones and asked for feedback

work_contribution.label: Please tell us the team member's contribution to the above works?.
messages: User contributed little to the project
In this work, my contribution is less than that of other team members.
User shared the work with other team members.
Shared the work with others, but had the majority of the contribution
You performed that entire part perfectly.

good_team_player.label: Were you a positive influence on other team members?
messages: Negatively affects teammates
Negatively affects teammates
Moderate
Moderately so
Very much so

feedback_times.label: On average, how many days do you incorporate feedback or corrections when they occur?
messages: 5 days or more
4 days or less
2 days or less
Within 1 day
Improve as soon as it happens

list.message2: Own your own career proof NFT!
list.banner2: Award NFTs to projects and individuals and be an influential group!

create.title: Create Group
create.description: Schools, companies, and institutions can create groups after verifying their official email.

form.name: Group Name
form.check: Can be checked in the group list and group detail view.

join_group.title: Join Group
join_group.desc: Send a request message to the group leader. If the leader approves, you can become a group member.
join_group.message_placeholder: Hello, I am Hong Gil-dong, a front-end developer.

invite.sended_desc: Once the user receives the message and accepts the invitation, they will be added as a new member. You can check the status of the invitation in member management.
invite.name: Name

join.join_group_desc: Send a request message to the group leader. If the leader approves, you can become a group member.
join.message_placeholder: Hello, I am Gil-dong Hong, a front-end developer.

mission.quit_title: Do you want to force end the mission?
mission.quit_desc: If you force end the mission, you can no longer update the achievement status of the mission, and members will not be able to receive NFT rewards.

create.title: Create Mission
create.name: Name
create.select_nft_desc: Please select the NFT to be awarded upon achieving the reward criteria.

manage.if_get: If you earn more than points
